reviews.text: The entry gates to this Parque are ivy-shrouded and mysterious, so clearly when I saw the gates open on my AM run along Diagonal I had to detour in to see.  Just a city park - but with weird and wonderful towers and lamps and bike racks, all the ordinary park things - but with a mischevious twist!  All centered on an old brick tower around which fanciful gardening has been planted.  I ran round and round in it a bit, just enjoying the mod/weird of it, before too many people and dogs and strollers chased me back out.  Worth 15 minutes if you happen by!
